item.title: How to include code coverage in Azure DevOps pipeline?
item.description: Azure Pipelines is a tool in the suite called Azure DevOps for software lifecycle management. One of the features offered is to make available dashboards that show the status of our artifacts at a glance. So we will see how you can generate an overview of the status of code coverage when there are multiple test projects.
